Hi! I’m Ishaan, and welcome to the GeeksForMovies App.

 I created this app as part of my journey in developing intuitive and enjoyable apps. Here, you’ll find the latest movies trending globally, top-rated gems, and much more—all designed to make your movie search simple and fun.

 This app is a portfolio project designed to showcase my skills and experience in Android application development, and your feedback is invaluable as I continue to grow in this field.

 Thanks for giving it a try!
 Happy movie hunting!
